isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - WINDSHIELD WIPER ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Windshield Wiper Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 121 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install windshield wiper assembly (Item 8) onto the four mounting studs (Items 5, 9 and 11) on the cab cowl.

Install hex flanged nut (Item 7, view arrow B) securing windshield wiper assembly (Item 8, view arrow B) to mounting stud (Item 9) on driver side of the cab cowl. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).

Install hex flanged nut (Item 10, view arrow C) securing windshield wiper assembly (Item 8, view arrow C) to mounting stud (Item 11) on passenger side of the cab cowl. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).

Install two hex flanged nuts (Item 3, view arrow A) securing windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 4, view arrow A) to mounting studs (Item 5) just below the windshield wiper motor at the center of the cab cowl. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 1) to windshield wiper motor connector (Item 2).

If required, position wiring harness (Item 13, view arrow A) at windshield wiper motor (Item 6) and/or windshield wiper motor mounting bracket (Item 4) and secure with ty-wrap (Item 12, view arrow A).

Install the cab cowl tray. Refer to
CAB COWL TRAY
. For installing cab cowl tray on models built before September 2000, refer to Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models before September 2000. For installing cab cowl tray on models built after September 2000, refer to Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models after September 2000. For installing cab cowl tray on models built after February 2002, refer to Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models after February 2002 and Standard Cab for 7700 Model after March 2005. For installing cab cowl tray on 8600 model, refer to Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model.

Install driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
. For installing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly on 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 models, refer to Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly on 8600 models, refer to Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model.
Lower tilt hood to closed position and latch hood on both sides.
Turn wipers on to high speed and activate windshield washer to check for proper operation. Adjust position of windshield wiper arm and blade assembly if required to obtain proper wiper operation.
